Mateo Kovacic very happy at Chelsea but 'too early' to talk Real Madrid exit

"It’s too early for these questions, I am here and very happy,"

"[Playing regularly] is good, I’m a little bit tired. I was not used to playing every three or four games and here it is very tough football."

"You can’t relax against anybody so it’s a little bit difficult but I really enjoy it. We have a great team, great fans and the city is nice. I like it a lot here.

"I go around and I enjoy the city — it’s huge and I haven’t seen enough of it yet. I’m looking forward to getting to know it more. I’m enjoying it. What’s the most interesting thing I’ve seen so far? The stadium.

"I don’t do anything special. I spend a lot of time in Cobham because I need to prepare myself for training and every game but after that I go home and enjoy time with my wife.

"Nothing special, we go for dinner, we live in the city so we are walking a lot. My family enjoys the city and that’s the most important thing for me in the end."

Zola on Sarri: "The team is following his advice very well. The players are getting benefits from what he is doing. Look at Ross Barkley and Ruben for example, other players are doing very well too and finding benefits. It is a good work environment."
Zola on Hazard injury: "He is certainly much better. We are not sure about today, but tomorrow he could join us in training. He may not be involved tomorrow but he should be okay for the weekend"

Zola on injuries: "There is Pedro, he has had a stomach ache. He is getting better, there is a little problem still. Giroud has a problem in one of his legs. Ampadu was back in training yesterday and we will decide tomorrow whether he is in the team"

It is a big boost for Mason Mount to get such positive comments from inside Maurizio Sarri's coaching team.

He still has much more work to do this season with Derby and there would be huge competition if he returned next season.

Antonio Rudiger -

"Sarri is a perfectionist but there is no perfection in life or football but we want to be as close to that as possible.

“Off the pitch he spreads jokes, he's like a father, he talks about normal things not just football but also life"

Maurizio Sarri reports he does not know yet whether Eden Hazard is fit to play for 90 minutes. He trained for a large part of the session yesterday. He can probably play for 40 to 45 minutes.

Sarri on Kante and Leicester: "I haven't spoken with him about what happened. I think for him it is not an easy moment, of course, I don't know exactly what because I haven't spoken."

Sarri on Kante's handling of Leicester: "I am not worried [about Kante]. He is able to play in the same when whatever his mental condition, so I am not worried."

Sarri is surprised at his start: "In every experience I have done before. I was in trouble in the first two months. I thought it would be the same here. I think here I was lucky. The players were able to win without a good level of tactical organisation"
Sarri on captaincy for Hazard or Luiz: "Cahill was captain last season. I spoke with his team-mates and everybody told me he was a really good captain."

Maurizio Sarri says Chelsea need to show defensive improvements

Maurizio Sarri speaks to Soccer Saturday about Chelsea's great start to the season, improvements they need to make and his love of the Premier League

Maurizio Sarri thinks Chelsea need to improve defensively if they are going to challenge for "very important targets".

Chelsea have made a strong start to the season under Sarri, who was appointed in the summer to replace Antonio Conte.

They are unbeaten in the Premier League and, ahead of their clash with Crystal Palace on Sunday, live on Sky Sports, they are two points behind Manchester City and Liverpool.

Redknapp's Loftus-Cheek concerns
Hazard 'fit enough for 45 minutes'

However, Sarri has outlined how he thinks his side can get better.

Chelsea v Crystal Palace

Stream live for a one-off payment of just £7.99

"I am very happy with the results and my players, but I know on the pitch we need to improve," he told Sky Sports.

"We have quality, technical qualities, and we need to improve the defensive phase, otherwise we are not a solid team. And if you are not a solid team you cannot have very important targets.

Chelsea vs C Palace

November 4, 2018, 3:30pm

Live on Sky Sports Premier League HD
"When I say defensive phase I am not talking about the defensive line, I am talking about all the team because it's very important for us to defend in the opponent's half and have the ball there.

"The defensive line is only a result of the defensive phase of the team, so it's important to improve as a team defensively. We have technical quality so we can be dangerous in the offensive phase and we can win matches without a very high level of tactical organisation; for that I am lucky."
